amendment.description: Amendment sought to preserve transparency requirements in EPA's final coal ash rule to ensure public access to information and accountability.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 114-216 to preserve transparency requirements in EPA's final coal ash rule to ensure public access to information and accountability.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 244 (Roll no. 453).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Pallone.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 244 (Roll no. 453).
